about_the_game:
*Game is currently not actively under development. Dec 2024. The plan is to resume work on Asterminer around summer 2025.

In Asterminer, explore the calm of space in a relaxed, atmospheric journey. Operate a mining ship, train, or walk around as the operator across distant planets and asteroids in a grounded sci-fi setting. It's a casual yet deep adventure with no danger, no enemies, and no violence, making space exploration a beautiful, contemplative experience. Enjoy the awesome music and the joy of gathering resources for your loved ones in this serene, unique game that celebrates the wonders of the cosmos.

Follow @BenerotEmpire on twitter for regular updates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 720 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a serene, atmospheric journey in space. Control a mining ship, train, and operator on distant planets and asteroids. Gather resources for your loved ones in this immersive, slow-paced, grounded sci-fi adventure.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Korean
